OOC: Are these guys at the Predacon base or the maximal base?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@r...> wrote:
> : : Hollywood/Sting/Savage/KroniK : :
> 
> Hollywood, Sting, Savage, Wrath, and Crush all follow loyally, ready
to cast genocide on the Predacons.  Hollywood sends out a special
message to everybody, the meaning directed at the Predacons.
> 
> Hollywood: Predacons, listen up brothers........WHATCHA GONNA DO,
WHEN THE nWo RUNS WILD ON YOU!???????????/
> 
> Hollywood draws his "Hulkablaster" gattling gun, and fires madly as
he flies closer to the Maximal base.  Sting, Savage, and KroniK also
make it to the Maximal base, and transform to robot mode, getting
ready to assume battle positions.
> 
> Sting:  This is the New...World...Order!  nWo, I'm going to get
inside, and mount a strategic offensive grasp on the Predacons! 
Arrow, can you come with me inside the Maximal base??
> 
>
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
> The preceding announcement has been paid for by the 
> New World Order
